languages.text: "Подобная сентиментальность — то, что никогда не позволит тебе подняться выше собственной примитивной природы. Что ж... значит, оставайся добычей до самой смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Подобная сентиментальность — то, что никогда не позволит тебе подняться выше собственной примитивной природы. Что ж... значит, оставайся добычей до самой смерти".

languages.text: "It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
languages.original_text: "Подобная сентиментальность — то, что никогда не позволит тебе подняться выше собственной примитивной природы. Что ж... значит, оставайся добычей до самой смерти".

traits.locale_text: "This sentimentality is what will always stop you from rising above your own primitive nature. If so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
"This sentimentality is what will always stop you from rising above your own primitive nature. If so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
"It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
"It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
"It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
"It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
"It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."

languages.text: «Este sentimentalismo es lo que os impedirá siempre conquistar vuestra naturaleza primitiva. En fin, si no tenéis alternativa... podéis vivir el resto de vuestros días como presas».
languages.original_text: "It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."

languages.text: 「その鑑賞こそが、お前を永遠に原始的な本性に繋ぎとめているのだ。それ以外に道がないのなら…残った日々を、獲物として生きるといい」
languages.original_text: "It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."

languages.text: “正是由于这样的多愁善感，你才无法超越你原始的本性。如果这就是你的道路，那么……在未来的日子里，你也只能永远当猎物了。”
languages.original_text: "It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."

languages.text: "Es ist diese Sentimentalität, die verhindert, dass Ihr Euch über euer primitives Wesen erhebt. Wenn es so sein muss ... könnt Ihr den Rest eures Lebens als Beute verbringen."
languages.original_text: "It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."

languages.text: « C'est ce sentimentalisme qui vous empêchera à jamais de vous élever au-dessus de votre propre nature primitive. S'il doit en être ainsi, alors… vivez donc le reste de vos jours comme une proie. »
languages.original_text: "It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
"It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."

languages.text: "İlkel tabiatının sınırlarını aşmanın önündeki ebedî engel işte bu duygusallığın. Böyle olması gerekiyorsa... Ömrünün geri kalanını av olarak geçirebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "It is this sentimentality that will forever keep you from rising above your own primitive nature. If it must be so, then... you can live out the rest of your days as prey."
